scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:calendar_CalendarListWidget_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:calendar_CalendarListWidget_Title}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="pageSize" labelResourceName="Calendar_PageSize" defaultValue="20" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="100" /> </property> <property id="showAll" labelResourceName="Calendar_ShowAllCalendars" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showTitleColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowTitle" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showGroupColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowGroup" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showPostsColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showLastPostColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="defaultSortOrder" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_DefaultSortOrder" defaultValue="ApplicationName" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="ApplicationName" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ApplicationName" /> <propertyValue value="ApplicationIdsOrder" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Custom" /> </property> <property id="calendarSelection" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_CalendarInclusion" dataType="Custom" template="calendar_v1_calendarOrder" key="calendar" visibilityPropertyId="defaultSortOrder" visibilityPropertyValue="ApplicationIdsOrder" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="calendar_CalendarListWidget_Description">Displays a list of Calendars</resource> <resource name="calendar_CalendarListWidget_Name">Event Calendar - Calendar List</resource> <resource name="calendar_CalendarListWidget_Title">Calendars</resource> <resource name="Calendar_CreateDate">Create Date</resource> <resource name="Calendar_Name">Name</resource> <resource name="Calendar_NoResults">No results could be found.</resource> <resource name="Calendar_PageSize">Calendars Per Page</resource> <resource name="Calendar_ShowAllCalendars">Show All Calendars</resource> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="next_event">Next event: {0}</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="post_plural">upcoming events</resource> <resource name="post_singular">upcoming event</resource> <resource name="Sort_Ascending">Ascending</resource> <resource name="Sort_Descending">Descending</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ApplicationName">By name</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_CalendarInclusion">Include Calendars</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Custom">Custom order</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_DefaultSortOrder">Sort Order</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowGroup">Show Group Name</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest">Show Upcoming Event Date</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts">Show Upcoming Event Count</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowTitle">Show Calendar Name</resource> </language>
